plot: Sozin's Comet is only three days away. Zuko tells the others what the Fire Lord plans on the day of the comet and the gang realizes that they must stop him before then. But Aang doubts that he can do what is expected of him.

Sozin's Comet is three days away and Aang has been practicing his fire bending extensively. Zuko informs everyone that he attended his father's war meeting. Zuko reveals that his father is planning a mass genocide on the Earth Kingdom. Aang is starting to have doubts on how to stop the Fire Lord. At night, Aang swims to a mysterious island. Zuko and his friends discover that Aang has disappeared, they try to find him with the help from June. Fire Lord Ozai crowns himself the Phoenix King and he makes Azula his successor to the throne. Aang wakes up on the mysterious island now in the middle of the ocean.—dawsonpersi
